mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_nickname, user_address, user_phone) VALUES (#{user_id},#{user_pw},#{user_name}, #{user_nickname},#{user_address},#{user_phone})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE user_id=#{user_id} and user_pw=#{user_pw}
SELECT user_id FROM user WHERE user_id=#{user_id}
SELECT user_nickname FROM user WHERE user_nickname=#{user_nickname}
